body: Photos & Multimedia       The Photos and Multimedia section allows you to visit the park through sound and visuals. You will experience first-hand the ecological and historic diversity that the Paterson and the Great Falls has to offer. Photo Archive/ Photo Downloads(on Flickr)      Check out our multimedia presentations!      Sneak a LIVE peak at the Great Falls, any time of day or night, with our Webcam.      Have you listened to the park's app/audio tour?       Learn more about Paterson's history, watch "Smokestacks and Steeples - A Portrait of Paterson"
title: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park: Photos & Multimedia
